message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am eager to share it. I propose a transaction where you could own this product for $12,500. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also offers you a considerable savings compared to its true market value. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
